sentences.en: A geometrical wonder, DOME ECILE not only is a sight in and of itself, but it also sports beautiful beach views.
sentences.cn: 这是一个几何学上的奇迹，DOME ECILE本身就是一处景观，但从这里你还可以看到漂亮的沙滩。

sentences.en: A large number of geometrical parameters influence these coefficients, and range of design configuration is wide.
sentences.cn: 有许多几何参数影响这些系数, 且设计外型变化很大.

sentences.en: Geometrical theorems grew out of empirical methods.
sentences.cn: 几何定理是从经验得出的.

sentences.en: Grassmann's exposition was almost inextricably bound up with geometrical ideas.
sentences.cn: 格拉斯门的叙述和几何概念有着几乎不可分割的联系.

sentences.en: He investigates geometrical properties of cycloids , epicycloids, and hypocycloids.
sentences.cn: 他研究了摆线 、 圆外旋轮线和四点圆的旋轮线的几何性质.

sentences.en: Heron also translated much of the Greek geometrical algebra into arithmetic and algebraic processes.
sentences.cn: Heoom又把不少希腊的几何代数法翻译成算术和代数步骤.

sentences.en: His " definition " of geometry guided geometrical thinking for about fifty years.
sentences.cn: 他的几何 “ 定义 ” 指引了几何思想约50年之久.

sentences.en: In future we shall drop the adjective " geometrical " when there is no risk of confusion.
sentences.cn: 以后,当无混淆之弊时,我们将去掉形容词 “ 几何 ” 二字.

sentences.en: Not all geometrical magnitudes of the same kind are commensurable with one another.
sentences.cn: 同类几何量中彼此之间并非都是可通约的.

sentences.en: The building has intricate geometrical designs on several of the walls.
sentences.cn: 建筑物的几面墙上有复杂的几何图案.

sentences.en: The geometrical representation makes the abstract concept pictorial.
sentences.cn: 几何图象使得抽象概念形象化.

sentences.en: The jumper has a geometrical pattern on it.
The perfectly geometrical simulation module model of warship wake was established.
sentences.cn: 摘要建立了较完备的尾流仿真模型,给出了尾流空穴模型和机动目标尾流的正确描述.

sentences.en: The versatile cable - stayed bridge concept lends itself to a large variety of geometrical configurations.
sentences.cn: 具有灵活性的斜拉桥设想,使其几何型式有多种多样变化.

trans.tran_cn: 几何的，几何学的，几何图案的，成几何级数增加的
